name: ghapp-cli
description: GitHub App CLI - A modular command-line interface for GitHub App APIs

scripts.test: node --experimental-loader ./test/mock-loader.js --test test/config.test.js test/fileUtils.test.js test/filters.test.js test/logger.test.js test/teams.test.js test/webhooks.test.js
scripts.test:watch: node --experimental-loader ./test/mock-loader.js --test --watch test/config.test.js test/fileUtils.test.js test/filters.test.js test/logger.test.js test/teams.test.js test/webhooks.test.js
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run package
scripts.package:all: npm run package:windows && npm run package:macos && npm run package:linux
scripts.package:windows: npm run create:windows:wrapper && npm run create:windows:package
scripts.package:macos: npm run create:unix:wrapper && npm run create:macos:package
scripts.package:linux: npm run create:unix:wrapper && npm run create:linux:package
scripts.create:windows:wrapper: echo @echo off > dist/ghapp.bat && echo set SCRIPT_DIR=%%~dp0 >> dist/ghapp.bat && echo node "%%SCRIPT_DIR%%build\index.js" %%* >> dist/ghapp.bat
scripts.create:unix:wrapper: echo '#!/bin/bash' > dist/ghapp && echo 'DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" &> /dev/null && pwd )"' >> dist/ghapp && echo 'node "$DIR/build/index.js" "$@"' >> dist/ghapp && chmod +x dist/ghapp
scripts.create:windows:package: if not exist dist\packages mkdir dist\packages && xcopy /E /I build dist\packages\ghapp-win\build\ && copy dist\ghapp.bat dist\packages\ghapp-win\ghapp.bat
scripts.create:macos:package: mkdir -p dist/packages/ghapp-macos && cp -r build dist/packages/ghapp-macos/ && cp dist/ghapp dist/packages/ghapp-macos/ghapp
scripts.create:linux:package: mkdir -p dist/packages/ghapp-linux && cp -r build dist/packages/ghapp-linux/ && cp dist/ghapp dist/packages/ghapp-linux/ghapp
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q dist build 2>nul || rm -rf dist build

author: DevOpsathon Team
